entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
